channel.title: Homework Help Specifications
channel.description: Hmm, I was reading through all the requests for homework help, but sadly I found a number of them vague, such as the "history:drugs" question. I think it would be nice to have some kind of guideline for asking questions. Or at least enforce the amount of detail that goes into each of them.

item.title: Homework Help Specifications
item.dc:creator: @anarkial anarkial
item.description:
@anarkial wrote:

Hmm, I was reading through all the requests for homework help, but sadly I found a number of them vague, such as the “history:drugs” question. I think it would be nice to have some kind of guideline for asking questions. Or at least enforce the amount of detail that goes into each of them.

Read full topic
